text: The 1963 Arab Cup was the 2nd Arab Cup tournament which took place in Kuwait. Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya and Iraq participated in the tournament. == Group stage == Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 4 3 1 0 6 2 +4 7 2 4 2 2 0 9 5 +4 6 3 4 1 1 2 5 5 0 3 4 4 1 1 2 4 5 –1 3 5 4 0 1 3 3 10 –7 1 13 November 1964 align=right align=right 15 November 1964 align=right align=right 16 November 1964 align=right align=right 18 November 1964 align=right align=right 20 November 1964 align=right align=right == Other websites == *Details in RSSSF Category:FIFA Arab Cup
title: 1964 Arab Cup
